text: How can I download all emails with attachments from Gmail?
How do I connect to Gmail and determine which messages have attachments?
I then want to download each attachment, printing out the Subject: and From: for each message as I process it.
I never found a nice solution to this problem so I'm going to start a bounty.
The person who provides the best answer wins.
I will test it against my Gmail account.
Answers in Perl, Python, and Java are acceptable.
